name: MAD PLATTER
description:
The Mad Hatter and the citizens of Underland are famous for outrageous tea parties. How outrageous is too outrageous?

My first creation in Bitsy was a cat.  When I could not figure out why my pixelated cat would not stop blinking in and out of existence, I decided to create a game with a cat that purposefully blinks in and out of existence: The Cheshire Cat. 

Although cats are generally considered simple animals, I know each one has a sliver of evil in their hearts. That makes them more lovable, though.
